department: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development
short_summary: Facility Condition Assessment services and Capital Planning and Management Software as a Service Software Solution (CPMOSS) for building conditions
description: The department requires an off-the-shelf software solution for facility information, with condition assessment capabilities, to support capital planning and management. The solution needs to be compatible with existing systems and enable accurate data collection and analysis. Suppliers are required to perform on-site condition assessments of all buildings, site amenities, and utility systems, including roads, parking lots, pedestrian walkways, site development, landscaping, water and sanitary sewers, heating and fuel distribution, electrical distribution, site lighting, and communications and security tunnels.

Description | 

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) intends to award a contract for Facility Condition Assessment services and Capital Planning and Management Software as a Service (CPMOSS) to a pre-selected supplier. This notice allows other suppliers to express interest in bidding.

The required CPMOSS will enable DFATD to:

* Determine the impact of different funding levels using scenario analysis tools
* Prioritize capital needs by creating multi-year budgets
* Access dashboards and reports for analytics and graphical representations
* Estimate renewal needs

The supplier will be required to perform on-site condition assessments of all DFATD's chancery and residence buildings worldwide, as well as site amenities and utility systems.

Trade Agreements | 
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
